title: Tubarões (Ao Vivo)
licensing_note: Lyrics via Musixmatch API; translations via Google Translate API; grammar notes auto-generated placeholders.

lines.text: Se quer saber de mim, hum, hum
lines.translation: If you want to know about me, hum, hum
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: Pergunte para mim
lines.translation: Ask me
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: Se for falar do que passou
lines.translation: If we're going to talk about what happened in the past
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: Conta a parte que você errou
lines.translation: Tell me the part you got wrong.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: Não pergunte se estou bem
lines.translation: Don't ask if I'm okay.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: Não quero ser assunto seu pra mais ninguém
lines.translation: I don't want to be your topic of conversation with anyone else.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: Não estrague as minhas canções
lines.translation: Don't ruin my songs.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: Vá pro inferno com suas recordações
lines.translation: Go to hell with your memories.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: Quem me deixou no mar
lines.translation: Who left me at sea?
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: Não tem direito de me perguntar
lines.translation: You have no right to ask me.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: O que rolou comigo e os tubarões
lines.translation: What happened to me and the sharks?
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: Cê não me deve amor, eu não te devo explicações
lines.translation: You don't owe me love, and I don't owe you explanations.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: Cê me deixou no ar
lines.translation: You left me hanging.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: Agora quer saber aonde eu vou posar
lines.translation: Now you want to know where I'm going to pose.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: Cancela as suas investigações
lines.translation: Cancel your investigations.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: Cê não me deve amor, eu não te devo explicações
lines.translation: You don't owe me love, and I don't owe you explanations.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: (Faz barulho, Uberlândia!)
lines.translation: (Make some noise, Uberlândia!)
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: (Yah! Oh, gente)
lines.translation: (Yeah! Oh, guys!)
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: (Só a gente, Victor Hugo!)
lines.translation: (Only us, Victor Hugo!)
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: (Obrigado pelo carinho)
lines.translation: (Thank you for your kindness)
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: (Pela presença de cada um de vocês)
lines.translation: (Thank you for being here, everyone)
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: Uoh-oh-oh-oh-oh (cê não me deve amor)
lines.translation: Uoh-oh-oh-oh-oh (you don't owe me love)
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: Cê não me deve amor, eu não te devo explicações
lines.translation: You don't owe me love, and I don't owe you explanations.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: (Boa noite, Uberlândia!)
lines.translation: (Good evening, Uberlândia!)
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: (Faz barulho aí, Uberlândia, que eu quero ouvir!)
lines.translation: (Make some noise, Uberlândia, I want to hear it!)
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: (Que coisa linda, galera! Obrigado!)
lines.translation: (That's beautiful, guys! Thank you!)
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.
